analysis.description:
LockingContract.noteTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#443-453) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(tokenBalance == totalTokens.add(_tokenAmount))

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol:
	Contract ThinkCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#404-405)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Crowdsale.approveMint (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#584-593) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#590-593)

Crowdsale.approveMintLocked (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#593-610) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(lockingContract,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#605-606)

Crowdsale.mintAllocation (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#610-618) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#615-616)

Crowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#618-620) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#497-538):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_saleCap <= _token.cap()) (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#522-526)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- approver (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#536)
	- lockingContract (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#528-532)
	- proposer (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#533-536)
	- saleCap (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#536)
	- saleEndTime (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#537-538)
	- saleStartTime (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#536-537)
	- token (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#527)

Reentrancy in LockingContract.noteTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#443-453):
	External calls:
	- tokenBalance = tokenContract.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#446)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#448-451)
	- totalTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#451-452)

Reentrancy in LockingContract.releaseTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#453-467):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.transfer(_beneficiary,amount)) (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#464-466)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xde0e8e785a0dba7ef8cf011a5894c4a9d1682098.sol#466-467)
